entry.string: Events is a module designed for displaying and managing various types of events.
entry.translation: Efents is a mudoole-a deseegned fur deespleying und munegeeng fereeuoos types ooff ifents. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: It also allows you to book tickets for these events through its ticket booking system. It is currently responsible for accomplishing these tasks:
entry.translation: It elsu elloos yuoo tu buuk teeckets fur zeese-a ifents thruoogh its teecket buukeeng system. It is coorrently respunseeble-a fur eccumpleeshing zeese-a tesks:

entry.string: This module is basically made out of two parts. The first one deals with the actual displaying of events, while the later with booking tickets in advance of an event.
entry.translation: Thees mudoole-a is beseecelly mede-a oooot ooff tvu perts. Zee furst oone-a deels veet zee ectooel deespleying ooff ifents, vheele-a zee leter veet buukeeng teeckets in edfunce-a ooff un ifent. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: usermenu -- Allows interface with the "My Account Page"
entry.translation: usermenoo -- Elloos interffece-a veet zee "My Eccuoont Pege-a"

entry.string: search -- Allows interface with Search Module
entry.translation: seerch -- Elloos interffece-a veet Seerch Mudoole

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
